sect1.title: assign_by_ref
sect1.para: This is used to assign values to the templates by reference instead of making a copy. See the PHP manual on variable referencing for an explanation.

note.title: Technical Note
note.para: This is used to assign values to the templates by reference. If you assign a variable by reference then change its value, the assigned value sees the change as well. For objects, assign_by_ref() also avoids an in-memory copy of the assigned object. See the PHP manual on variable referencing for an in-depth explanation.
